name: I like dice, Implement dice.
description:
A frustrating game for GMTK Jam 2022.

---  Can you beat levels with any kind of system error? ---

The dangerous world of randomizing things.

We start with a fairly basic platforming game but time is running out and we don't have much, Put dice on it! More dice! I want dice! I like dice! Random things are fun! ... ok, but they are also dangerous.

You do not know how you will have to pass the levels, Roll of the dice and discover your destiny.

Objects:

> Less Gravity: Decreases the gravity of the game.

> Non Stop: the character cannot stop moving forward.

> Spring: The character cannot stop jumping.

> Super computer: The game goes much faster.

> Low quality router: The game slows down and speeds up without warning.

> Mirror: The controls are reversed.

> No batteries: The light turns on and off without meaning.

Characters: Each character has their own differentiated stats

CONTROLS:

SPACE / UP / W - Jump - DoubleJump - WallJump

Arrows/ A/D - Left - Right

R-Restart

ESC - Menu - ReRoll

Designer Note: Although it may seem like it, all levels can be overcome with all combinations, but of course, some are easier and some much more frustrating, good luck.
